A typical 거인 독수리 stands about 10 feet tall, has a wingspan of up to 20 feet, and resembles its smaller cousins in nearly every way except size. It weighs about 500 pounds.

거인 독수리은 Common and Auran을(를) 말할 수 있습니다.

전투

COMBAT

A 거인 독수리 typically 공격 from a great height, diving earthward at tremendous 속도. When it cannot dive, it uses its powerful talons and slashing beak to strike at its target의 head and eyes.

A solitary 거인 독수리 is typically hunting or patrolling in the vicinity of its nest and generally ignores creatures that do not appear threatening. A mated pair 공격 in concert, making repeated diving 공격 to drive away intruders, and fights to the death to defend their nest or hatchlings.

회피 (Ex): With a successful Reflex save against an 공격 that allows a Reflex save for half 피해, a 거인 독수리 takes no 피해.

스킬: 거인 독수리 have a +4 racial 보너스 on 감지 checks.

거대 독수리 훈련

TRAINING A GIANT EAGLE

Although intelligent, a 거인 독수리 requires training before it can bear a rider in 전투. To be trained, a 거인 독수리 must have a friendly attitude toward the trainer (this can be achieved through a successful 외교 check). Training a friendly 거인 독수리 requires six weeks of work and a DC 25 동물 조련 check.

Riding a 거인 독수리 requires an exotic saddle. A 거인 독수리 can fight while carrying a rider, but the rider cannot also 공격 unless he or she succeeds on a 탑승 check.

거인 독수리 eggs are worth 2,500 gp apiece on the open market, while chicks are worth 4,000 gp each. Professional trainers 돌격 1,000 gp to rear or train a 거인 독수리.

운반 수용량: A 빛 load for a 거인 독수리 is up to 300 pounds; a medium load, 301–600 pounds; and a heavy load, 601–900 pounds.

전투

Combat

Their rapid 속도 makes 공기 정령 useful on vast battlefields or in extended aerial 전투.

Air Mastery (Ex): Airborne creatures take a –1 페널티 on 공격 and 피해 rolls against an 공기 정령.

훨윈드(Su): 정령 can transform itself into a 훨윈드 once every 10 minutes and remain in that form for up to 1 round for every 2 HD it has. In this form, 정령 can 이동 through the air or along a surface at its 비행 속도.

훨윈드 is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 30 feet wide at the top, and up to 50 feet tall, depending on 정령의 size. 정령 controls the exact height, but it must be at least 10 feet.

정령의 이동 while in 훨윈드 form does not provoke 기회 공격, even if 정령 enters the space another creature occupies. Another creature might be caught in 훨윈드 if it touches or enters 훨윈드, or if 정령 이동 into or through the creature의 space.

Creatures one or more size categories smaller than 정령 might take 피해 when caught in 훨윈드(see the table below for details) and may be lifted into the air. An affected creature must succeed on a Reflex save when it comes into contact with 훨윈드 or take the indicated 피해. It must also succeed on a second Reflex save or be picked up bodily and held suspended in the powerful 바람, automatically taking the indicated 피해 each round. A creature that can 비행 is allowed a Reflex save each round to escape the 훨윈드. The creature still takes 피해 but can leave if the save is successful. The DC for 내성 굴림 against 훨윈드의 effects varies with 정령의 size (see the table). The save DC is 근력 based.

Creatures trapped in 훨윈드 cannot 이동 except to go where 정령 carries them or to escape the 훨윈드.

Creatures caught in 훨윈드 can otherwise act normally, but must succeed on a 집중 check (DC 15 + spell 레벨) to 주문 시전. Creatures caught in 훨윈드 take a –4 페널티 to 민첩 and a –2 페널티 on 명중 굴림. 정령 can have only as many creatures trapped inside 훨윈드 at one time as will fit inside 훨윈드의 volume.

정령 can eject any carried creatures whenever it 소원, depositing them wherever 훨윈드 happens to be. A summoned 정령 always ejects trapped creatures before returning to its home plane.

If 훨윈드의 base touches the ground, it creates a swirling cloud of debris. This cloud is centered on 정령 and has a diameter equal to half 훨윈드의 height. The cloud obscures all 시야, including 암흑시야, beyond 5 feet. Creatures 5 feet away have 은폐, while those farther away have total 은폐.

Those caught in the cloud must succeed on a 집중 check (DC 15 + spell 레벨) to 주문 시전.

An 정령 in 훨윈드 form cannot make slam 공격 and does not threaten 범위 around it.

전투

Combat

Though an 땅의 정령 이동 slowly, it is a relentless opponent. It can travel though solid ground or stone as easily as 인간 walk on the earth의 surface. It cannot 수영, however, and must either walk around a body of water or go through the ground under it. An 땅의 정령 can 이동 along the bottom of a body of water but prefers not to.

Earth Mastery (Ex): An 땅의 정령 gains a +1 보너스 on 공격 and 피해 rolls if both it and its foe are touching the ground. If an opponent is airborne or waterborne, 정령 takes a –4 페널티 on 공격 and 피해 rolls. (These 수정치 are not included in 수치 표.)

Push (Ex): An 땅의 정령 can start a 황소 쇄도 maneuver without provoking an 공격 of opportunity. 전투 수정치 given in Earth Mastery, above, also apply to 정령의 opposed 근력 checks.

Earth Glide (Ex): An 땅의 정령 can glide through stone, dirt, or almost any other sort of earth except metal as easily as a fish 수영 through water. Its burrowing leaves behind no tunnel or hole, nor does it create any ripple or other signs of its presence. A 지형 조정 spell cast on an 범위 containing a burrowing 땅의 정령 flings 정령 back 30 feet, stunning the creature for 1 round unless it succeeds on a DC 15 Fortitude save.
